message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the potential benefits it will bring me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $925,000. I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.

I understand your perspective, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it.

Bob, I'm sensing we're getting closer to a deal.  I'm willing to consider a final offer of $900,000. This is a significant reduction on my initial price and reflects my desire to see this product in your capable hands.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it.
